_source.text: 2006 Twisted Oak River of Skull Mourvèdre (pictured far right): What says Halloween better than a blood-red skull?

text: 2006 Twisted Oak River of Skull Mourvèdre (pictured far right): What says **Halloween** **better** **than** a **blood**-red skull?

_source.text: After all, nothing's better than a little Winter warm-up to get your blood flowing.

text: After all, nothing's **better** **than** a little **Winter** warm-up to get your **blood** flowing.
